name: Another Trivial Story
description:
"Another Trivial Story" is visual novel type that was made as a stranger things tribute, trying to take  influences in a trivial way of max and vecna fight scene.

this is a strictly educational project that is focused on  create the story using and exploring AI generate images tools like Stable diffusion. 

 For the narrative and dialogues i have worked with ink by inkle : Ink Unity Integration | Integration | Unity Asset Store

Sound assets taken from: https://www.zapsplat.com/
